text: Beautiful spot for a walk or jog! Bedok Reservoir's lush greenery and picturesque views of the water make it an ideal destination for outdoor enthusiasts. Well-maintained and clean facilities too. It’s always a nice 5 km walk !

Nice views and the water is blue. Really relaxing to paddle here or even to take a walk. Shower facilities are good, with many clean cubicles. Water coolers are present too. There are also lockers which are super convenient
This 4.3km gravel track loops around the reservoir, offering a scenic water view for walks, jogs or runs

The water was soothing indeed!! However, there were not enough trees to provide shade for the path round the reservoir. Do also take note that the path is not paved but laid with sand. I started close to 7:55 am, and took about 85 minutes to walk one full round around the reservoir. This included taking photos along the way and two water breaks in between.

⛱️Bedok Reservoir is a former sand quarry converted to a reservior.
🌊🚶A 4.3 km long gravel track loop around the Reservior.
🚣🏋️Bedok Reservior Park is an inclusive park catering to all.
🌻🚴🚣There are many facilities and amenities around the expansive park.
🎣🧸🏋️🪻🛼There are Fishing Deck, Playgrounds, Fitness Corners, Allotment Garden, Amphitheatre, Therapeutic Garden and Boardwalk peppered around the Park.
🦅In addition, there is a space catering for bird lovers to hang their cages.
🪖⛑️For those who adventurous, there is a Treetop Obstacle Course and a Zipline fun.
🛶And you can do kayaking around the Reservior waters which is run by PAssion WaVe @Bedok Reservoir.
🧘💃🤼Morning hours are burstling life at the Park.
Groups of seniors gathered for taichi, yoga and meditation session behind the Pavilion and Wawawa bistro.
🌳The expansive park is endowed with lush greenery, providing a welcome shade that makes for a comfortable stroll even during midday.
🚝🛴Getting here is easy.
Bedok Reservior Park is a 10 mins walk from Bedok Reservior MRT Station exit A.
